title: AI sticky generator for n8n templates
description: This workflow helps template creators automatically generate an overview sticky note for any n8n template. Paste your workflow JSON into the Set node, run the workflow, and the AI returns a ready-to-use sticky note node JSON with a clear title, “How it works” steps and a setup checklist - all formatted in Markdown and sized correctly for the canvas.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
